Quickstrike:









Quickstrike screamed at the sudden sight of Crow Lord. It wasn't helping his 
nerves any. His tail went up and hissed it warning. The Fuzor was on high 
edge, with his damage and all. Not much held him back from striking out on 
the robot. His life was in grave danger. He was slowly dying. Slowly, day by 
day.
